abilities.name: Flare
abilities.description: Reveal stealthed/hidden units and items in the area

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: Become stealthed until the end of your next turn, or until damaged or revealed. Your speed is reduced by <50-AGI*2%>

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Use your reaction to reduce incoming melee or projectile based damage by <DEX*4%>

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: Use your reaction to reduce incoming AoE based damage by <AGI*5%>

abilities.name: Quick Attack
abilities.description: Make a quick attack, entering the turn order at <30+AGI*1.5%>

abilities.name: Agitate
abilities.description: Reduce the target’s morale, lowering all stats for the duration of the combat by 1

abilities.name: Climber
abilities.description: Add <STR/4> to your <JMP> passively

abilities.name: Momentum
abilities.description: Restore <4+END/5%> energy at the end of each turn

abilities.name: Counter Attack
abilities.description: Use your reaction to make a melee or ranged counterattack when hit

abilities.name: Guile
abilities.description: Increase the unit's <CHA> by 3

abilities.name: Poison Weapon
abilities.description: Coat your weapon with poison, causing it's next strike to poison the target. The poison deals <5+INT/3%> of the unit's max health until cured.

abilities.name: Interrupt
abilities.description: Strike a unit with your melee weapon, interrupting any charging ability and reducing the unit's current turn charge by <DEX*3%>

abilities.name: Scan
abilities.description: Reveal detailed information of units in the area (stats, abilities etc.)

abilities.name: Repair
abilities.description: Repair a mechanical unit for <15+DEX*2%> max health

abilities.name: Resist UP
abilities.description: All units gain <WIL*5%> resistance to all elements for <CHA> turns

abilities.name: Mech Cloak
abilities.description: After being hit, use your reaction to release a wave of electricity, dealing <20+END> base shock damage and stunning for 1 round

abilities.name: Flare Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 20 base heat damage

abilities.name: Cryo Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 20 base cold damage

abilities.name: Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 20 base explosive damage

abilities.name: Shock Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 20 base shock damage

abilities.name: Corrosive Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 20 base acid damage

abilities.name: Toxic Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 20 base poison damage

abilities.name: EMP Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that that deals 30 base pulse damage

abilities.name: Unstable Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 30 base radiation damage

abilities.name: Void Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 25 base gravity damage

abilities.name: Cybernetics: Legs
abilities.description: Mechanically enhance unit's legs, increasing <AGI> by 3 and making the unit mechanical

abilities.name: Cybernetics: Arms
abilities.description: Mechanically enhance unit's arms, increasing <STR> by 3 and making the unit mechanical

abilities.name: Cybernetics: Brain
abilities.description: Mechanically enhance unit's cerebral cortex, increasing <INT> by 3 and making the unit mechanical

abilities.name: Cybernetics: Eyes
abilities.description: Mechanically enhance unit's eyes, increasing <DEX> by 3 and making the unit mechanical

abilities.name: Cybernetics: Lungs
abilities.description: Mechanically enhance unit's resperitory system, increasing <END> by 3 and making the unit mechanical

abilities.name: Cybernetics: Heart
abilities.description: Mechanically enhance unit's body, increasing <WIL> by 3 and making the unit mechanical

abilities.name: Bolster
abilities.description: Increase all stats for all allies in the radius by 1

abilities.name: Aim
abilities.description: Increase <SKL> by <WIL/2%+WIL*2>

abilities.name: Shout
abilities.description: Increase <POW> by <WIL/2%+WIL*2>

abilities.name: Focus
abilities.description: Increase <TAC> by <WIL/2%+WIL*2>

abilities.name: Heroic Leap
abilities.description: Jump to a neighboring hex with a jump distance of <JMP+STR/4> and immediately make an attack with your equipped weapon, dealing <15+CHA*2%> additional damage

abilities.name: Heroic Charge
abilities.description: Charge to a tile with a move of <MOV+AGI/4> and immediately make an attack with your equipped melee weapon, dealing <15+CHA*2%> additional damage

abilities.name: Power Attack
abilities.description: Make a melee attack dealing <25+STR/4*2%> Additional Damage

abilities.name: Power Shot
abilities.description: Make a ranged attack dealing <25+DEX*2%> Additional Damage

abilities.name: Hardy
abilities.description: All damage taken is reduced by <END*2%>

abilities.name: Vengeance
abilities.description: All melee damage dealt is increased by 25% when low health. Low health is anything under <WIL+END%>

abilities.name: Reversal
abilities.description: Use your reaction to swap places with an attacking unit in melee

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Slam an enemy, dealing <STR%> of your <maximum health> as damage and knocking back <STR/3> units

abilities.name: Opportunity
abilities.description: When a unit moves out of your melee range, use your reaction to make an attack against it, dealing <INT*5%> bonus damage

abilities.name: Quick Draw
abilities.description: Switching a weapon from inventory returns you into the turn order at <40+AGI%> charge

abilities.name: First Aid
abilities.description: Heal a unit in melee range for <15+CHA%> of their maximum health

abilities.name: Resuscitate
abilities.description: Bring a fainted unit back to life with <1+CHA*3%> max health. The target gains <20+AGI+DEX%> bonus speed until their next turn

abilities.name: Healing Field
abilities.description: Place a healing field bot with <20+5*INT> health and <100+20*INT> speed. Every turn the field heals units in a <4+INT/2> hex radius for <5+.5*INT%>

abilities.name: Recovery
abilities.description: Recover <1+END/3%> max health at the end of each turn

abilities.name: Sprint
abilities.description: Use your action to move <AGI/2> additional units

abilities.name: Precision Strike
abilities.description: Perform an attack with a melee weapon, striking a vital point to decrease the target’s healing received permanently by <STR*2%>

abilities.name: Cripple
abilities.description: Perform an attack with a ranged weapon, striking a vital point to decrease the targets next movement by <DEX/2>

abilities.name: Shield Boost
abilities.description: Upgrade an ally’s shield temporarily, boosting its maximum and current capacity by <WIL*3%> for <INT> turns

abilities.name: Concentrate
abilities.description: Abilities you use for the next <WIL> turns cannot be interrupted. While active, when reduced below 1 health, set health to 1 and end the effect.
